text: 'iinaa fatahna lak -ayha alrswl- fthana mbynana, yuzhir allah fih dynk, wayansurak ealaa edwk, wahu hudna "alhdyby" alty 'amn alnaas bsbbha bedhm bedana, fatset dayirat aldaewat ldyn allh, wtmkn man yurid alwqwf ealaa hqyqt al'islam min merfth, fdkhl alnaas tilk almudat fi din allah afwajana; wldhlk smmah allah fthana mbynana, 'aya zahrana jlyana
